OOC: Ok, Orchid you have always had my respect, but you just pushed my limit. Now I have agreed with Lurker, Hollywood Narrator, and you all along, and I have nothing against them, just you. You talk about the problems and how people like Cardhead jump on people for nothing, and you are right. But look at what you just did. This Cassidy made just one post to compliment this RPG and you jumped on her for it. Just because you are having problems here means that nobody can like this RPG? We will be better off without that attitude!

And also lay off Airly! What the hell has she done. We know why she has bad english, it's not her language! If you cant use a little brain power to understand her posts then your not even worth RPing. From what I have seen Airly has always been polite to everyone here no matter what, and she should be treated the same. With kindness! Her RPing is just fine too.

--Boundary_(ID_BRK6QQbPy/Q3pgft5ZL6Xw)
